title: Hoshizaki America
cleaned_text: By clicking accept, you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation and analyze site usage. Cookie Settings ACCEPT PERFORMANCE COOKIES Users can control and refuse the use of cookies at the individual browser level. Cookies installed can be deleted. If you reject cookies, you may still use our Website, but your ability to use some features or areas of our Website may be limited. View Privacy Policy for more information. Elements of the Website may not function properly, if the following are unchecked: PROTECTING PERSONAL INFORMATION Keeping personal information confidential and secure is of utmost importance to us. We share your personal information only to perform routine business and administrative functions, and we DO NOT sell your personal information to any third-party for their own advertising or marketing purposes. [full details] YOUR RIGHTS & OPTIONS You may, at any time, request that we stop sending you marketing or information-related materials by following the "unsubscribe" instructions included in marketing emails or by contacting us directly.
